arts.ttl: Man City 2-0 Leicester: Jack Grealish ends Premier League goal drought as City maintain Champions League push
arts.sum: Pep Guardiola watched on from the stands as Man City eased to victory over the Premier League strugglers

arts.ttl: No Haaland, no problem as Man City beat Leicester to go fourth
arts.sum: With Haaland likely to miss at least four more Premier League games with the ankle injury he suffered in Sunday's FA Cup quarter-final win at Bournemouth, several Man City attackers have a chance to stake a claim for a regular starting spot. Jack Grealish scored his first Premier League goal in almost 16 months as Manchester City moved up to fourth in the table with a 2-0 victory over Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Van Nistelrooy 'expected more intensity' from Foxes
arts.sum: Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says he "expected more intensity" from the Foxes after a 2-0 loss to Manchester City, but urges his side to "keep their spirits high".p their spirits high".

arts.ttl: Van Nistelrooy resigned to relegation as Leicester lose again
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy has admitted the gap to 17th place is ‘too much’ for Leicester after his side lost 2-0 at Manchester City. Leicester’s woeful record extended to 14 league defeats in 15 games as goals from Jack Grealish and Omar Marmoush earned Manchester City the points at the Etihad. The Foxes have picked up […] The post Van Nistelrooy resigned to relegation as Leicester lose again first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Man City 2-0 Leicester: Player ratings as Grealish scores first Premier League goal since 2023
arts.sum: Player ratings from the Premier League clash between Manchester City and Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Jack Grealish and Omar Marmoush on target as Manchester City ease past Leicester
arts.sum: The England international scored his first Premier League goal in 16 months and Omar Marmoush also struck as the champions outplayed the Foxes.

arts.ttl: Manchester City v Leicester, Newcastle v Brentford, and more: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Updates from Wednesday’s Premier League games Liverpool v Everton – live with Michael Butler Live scoreboard | Read Football Daily | Email Simon That is an absurdly easy goal to score in the second minute of a game. Leicester lose the ball in their own half and Manchester City work it to the right touchline. Grealish stands in the middle, 15 yards out, with his arms out and the ball is passed, not even very quickly, through the area to him, and he strokes it in! In their last four games Leicester have won no points, scored no goals, conceded 10 and have generally been in all ways utterly abysmal (if still not as abysmal as Southampton, who have also won no points but have a goal difference of -11). But Manchester City are a lowly 16th in a last-four-game table with four points, and are without Erling Haaland. Is there just a glimmer of hope there for the visitors? Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Gary Lineker makes feelings clear on new job and answers Leicester City Match of the Day question
arts.sum: Former Leicester City striker and Match of the Day host Gary Lineker has disclosed his plans to step away from the television limelight after concluding his tenure on the show at the end of this season. During the latest Q&A episode of The Rest is Football, the ex-forward addressed the possibility of a Championship version of Match of the Day should Leicester City be relegated.

arts.ttl: Leicester City team news v Man City as Ruud van Nistelrooy stays true to his word
arts.sum: Ruud van Nistelrooy has named the same Leicester City line-up for the third straight match as he stays true to his word and true to his new formation. City (5-2-1-2): Hermansen; Justin, Faes, Coady, Thomas, Kristiansen; Ndidi, Soumare; El Khannouss; Daka, Vardy.

arts.ttl: Man City vs. Leicester confirmed lineups: Omar Marmoush, Nico O'Reilly among six changes for Pep Guardiola as Oscar Bobb returns
arts.sum: Manchester City and Leicester City confirm their starting lineups for tonight's Premier League clash at the Etihad Stadium.
